[00:15.40]Composed by：Anthony Kilhoffer/Teddy Walton/Aaron Bow/Scott Mescudi/Kevin Parker
[00:23.10]Hey
[00:24.32]Seen nothing like that shorty with the fat back movin' to the vibes
[00:27.41]Vibes
[00:27.95]Say "I'm just up in my habitat playin' little Ratatat kickin' with my tribe"
[00:31.20]Ride
[00:32.09]I'm sayin' it's a known fact show 'em n***a no act sucker fall in line
[00:35.26]Yeah
[00:35.89]I'm out to get mine woah woah n***as seein' me shine
[00:38.88]Ride
[00:39.84]Catch me baked outside wonderin' daily why why
[00:43.83]Will she let me get behind Baby just close your eyes
[00:46.92]Eyes
[00:47.64]You see we takin' off leave the stress no time
[00:50.78]Bye
[00:51.60]This ain't televised see I'm her surprise I
[00:56.08]Ooh-ooh ooh that vibe
[00:59.90]Ooh-ooh ooh that vibe
[01:03.76]Ooh-ooh I need those f**kin' vibes
[01:07.61]Doo-doo-doo-doo and we ragin' 'til daylight
[01:11.34]Things are gettin' gnarly got my whiskey by my side
[01:15.12]Soarin' through my world and I'm 'bout to take a dive
[01:19.00]This is just the sadness in me sad times
[01:22.94]Just another evening and I'm leanin' oh
[01:25.70]Let's get it
[01:26.36]Uh ready go set we won't hold you neither
[01:29.27]Uh
[01:29.77]Salute when you see that n***a
[01:31.29]Yeah
[01:31.70]Tell him "Go off" when you see him greet him
[01:33.70]Mm
[01:34.20]Talkin' s**t f**k ya legend of the cold one nice
[01:37.08]This my life all my nights
[01:39.04]Walkin' like a disco ball all this ice aye
[01:42.14]Ayy ayy ayy ayy
[01:45.30]This the story
[01:46.03]Ayy ayy ayy Woo
[01:48.95]Ayy
[01:49.28]Of a man
[01:49.85]Ayy ayy ayy Woo
[01:52.75]Ayy
[01:53.03]And you know it
[01:54.25]Ayy ayy ayy
[01:55.90]Move move
[01:56.59]Ayy
[01:56.88]Catch the show
[01:58.06]Slightly paranoid can't believe 'em simply
[02:00.98]Yeah
[02:01.58]Nah bulls**t miss me Nah nah ahh
[02:03.82]Call it what it is then lies
[02:05.68]This my fantasy high sayin' goodbye
[02:10.07]I lay at night it intensifies
data.trans:
[ti:Dive (Explicit)]
[ar:Kid Cudi]
[al:Man On The Moon III: The Chosen (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:07.70]//
[00:15.40]//
[00:23.10]//
[00:24.32]从未见过像这样凹凸有致的辣妹 重新找回愉悦的氛围
[00:27.41]氛围
[00:27.95]说道我只是在我的地盘里 放着Ratatat歌 与我的朋友一起狂欢
[00:31.20]尽情驰骋
[00:32.09]我说 这是人尽皆知的事实 给他们露两手 不要装腔作势 乖乖听话
[00:35.26]//
[00:35.89]我要开创自己的事业 大家看见我熠熠生辉
[00:38.88]尽情驰骋
[00:39.84]撞见我在外面找刺激 每天都充满疑问
[00:43.83]她会不会让我跟在她身后 宝贝 闭上你的眼睛
[00:46.92]眼睛
[00:47.64]你看见我们平步青云 摆脱压力 没有时间
[00:50.78]再见
[00:51.60]这不是电视直播  我是她的惊喜
[00:56.08]那种氛围
[00:59.90]那种氛围
[01:03.76]我需要美好的氛围
[01:07.61]我们尽情狂欢 直到天明
[01:11.34]情况愈发危险 我身边放着威士忌酒
[01:15.12]在我的世界里翱翔 我摇摇欲坠
[01:19.00]这只是我内心的悲伤 痛苦的时刻
[01:22.94]只是另一个夜晚 我嗨到不能自已
[01:25.70]让我们行动起来
[01:26.36]准备出发吧 我们不会阻止你
[01:29.27]//
[01:29.77]当你看见这个家伙时 你要敬礼致意
[01:31.29]//
[01:31.70]当你看见他 跟他打招呼时 叫他走开
[01:33.70]//
[01:34.20]胡说八道 去你的 冷酷无情的人的传奇 无与伦比
[01:37.08]这是我的人生 我所有夜晚
[01:39.04]招摇过市 就像是迪斯科闪光球 珠光宝气
[01:42.14]//
[01:45.30]这是一位
[01:46.03]//
[01:48.95]//
[01:49.28]男人的故事
[01:49.85]//
[01:52.75]//
[01:53.03]你心知肚明
[01:54.25]//
[01:55.90]行动起来
[01:56.59]//
[01:56.88]观看演出
[01:58.06]有点偏执 不能轻易地相信他们
[02:00.98]//
[02:01.58]大肆吹捧 对我念念不忘
[02:03.82]随便你怎么说 谎话连篇
[02:05.68]这是我幻想的快乐 说再见吧
[02:10.07]夜晚 我静静躺着 愈发强烈
